rules.label: User Does Not Desire Full Anonymity

fields.name: Screen_ConfirmationForAnonymousUser_DisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Your report has been submitted successfully. 


EXTREMELY IMPORTANT: since you are submitting this report as a fully anonymous user, YOU MUST SAVE YOUR UNIQUE REPORT IDENTIFIER (click the download button below to do so) because we do not, and will not, have the ability to know who you are. This means, that without your Unique Report Identifier below, there will be no way for us to locate your records and provide you with any updates or results if you do not save your Unique Report Identifier.


Unique Report Identifier: {!Record_WhistleblowerReport_Main.Anonymous_Id__c}


Helpful Links To View Updates & Results:


Whistleblower Report: {!BaseRedirectURL}/whistleblower-protection-home/whistleblower-report/{!Record_WhistleblowerReport_Main.Id}


Related Investigations: {!BaseRedirectURL}/whistleblower-protection-home/whistleblower-report/{!Record_WhistleblowerReport_Main.Id}/Investigations__r


Related Actions Taken: {!BaseRedirectURL}/whistleblower-protection-home/whistleblower-report/{!Record_WhistleblowerReport_Main.Id}/Actions_Taken__r


NOTE: since you reported this anonymously then we don't store any personal details in our systems.


TO SAVE YOUR UNIQUE IDENTIFIER AND THE LINKS ABOVE, CLICK THE DOWNLOAD BUTTON BELOW.

fields.name: Screen_ConfirmationForNonAnonymousUser_DisplayText_SuccessMessage
fields.fieldText: We have received your report and we will begin the evaluation process.

fields.name: Screen_ConfirmationForNonAnonymousUser_DisplayText_NextStepsMessage
fields.fieldText:
NEXT STEPS


To view updates on your report use the "View Submission & Results" tab in the navigation menu as seen below:


To view updates on your report use the "View Submission & Results" tab in the navigation menu. This will open a dropdown that gives you four options:


Screenshot 2023-12-06 at 4.49.31 PM.png


Whistleblower Reports (your submissions)

Related Investigations (investigations related to your submissions)

Related Actions Taken (actions taken related to your submissions and investigations)

Support Cases (support cases related to your submissions)

Helpful Links To View Updates & Results:


Whistleblower Report: {!BaseRedirectURL}/whistleblower-protection-home/whistleblower-report/{!Record_WhistleblowerReport_Main.Id}


Related Investigations: {!BaseRedirectURL}/whistleblower-protection-home/whistleblower-report/{!Record_WhistleblowerReport_Main.Id}/Investigations__r


Related Actions Taken: {!BaseRedirectURL}/whistleblower-protection-home/whistleblower-report/{!Record_WhistleblowerReport_Main.Id}/Actions_Taken__r


DISCLAIMERS 


• Right to communicate with Congress 


• Risk of retaliation, consult experienced counsel 


• Blow the whistle on own time with own resources 


• Your office's jurisdiction 


• No classified information over unsecured channels 


• Office confidentiality practices, and right to confidentiality

fields.name: Screen_ConfirmationForAnonymousUser_DisplayText_EmailMessage
fields.fieldText: NOTE: We will email you confirmation of your report submission. This email will contain the next steps and disclaimers mentioned above so that you can refer to them if you ever need them.

fields.name: Screen_UserMissingData_FormInstructions
fields.fieldText: Fill out any missing fields and ensure that all fields with existing values are correct.

fields.name: Screen_WhistleblowerReport_Intro_DisplayText_PrivacyCol2
fields.fieldText:
You have the right to privacy and how your identity and personal information is used. You can choose to be fully anonymous, confidential, or Non-Anonymous & Non-Confidential.


  • Fully Anonymous - we do not store your data and therefore have no knowledge of who you are.
  • Confidential - you allow us to store your data and reveal your identity to us, but we keep that information private and fully confidential.
  • Non-Anonymous & Non-Confidential - you allow us to know and reveal your identity.


Privacy Acknowledgement

fields.name: PrivacyAcknowledgement
fields.fieldText: By checking this box, I acknowledge that I fully understand my privacy rights defined above

validationRule.errorMessage: You must agree to the terms to proceed.

fields.name: Screen_WhistleblowerReport_Intro_PrivacyRequired
fields.helpText:
Fully Anonymous - means we do not store any user data in our systems and we will not know who you are.


Confidential - means we do store your user data and we do know who you are, but we would keep that information private.


Non-Anonymous / Non-Confidential - means you don't want to be anonymous or kept confidential.

fields.name: Screen_WhistleblowerReport_Intro_TypeOfAssistanceNeeded
fields.helpText: Select what seems to make the most sense for the "category" of the issue that you would like to disclose.

fields.name: RepresentedByLawyer
fields.fieldText: Will you be represented by a lawyer?

fields.name: Screen_WhistleblowerReport_Intro_ExternalCommunicationConsent
fields.fieldText: Do you consent to communication via phone or email?
fields.helpText: If yes to either one of them, then check this box.

fields.name: Screen_WhistleblowerReport_Intro_CommunicationPreference
fields.helpText: Preferred method of communication. This is how we will contact you and send you updates.

fields.name: Screen_WhistleblowerReport_Intro_IssueBeingDisclosed
fields.helpText: This is a detailed description of the issue being disclosed. Please be as thorough as possible.

fields.name: Screen_WhistleblowerReport_Terms_DisplayText_Main
fields.fieldText:
Terms & Conditions


Your Privacy Rights:

Privacy rights will be provided for you. You will be given the right to choose whether to reveal your identity, along with any other personal information, or not.

  • If you choose not to reveal your identity, we will not request or store any of your personal information. If you are an existing user in our system and we already have personal data related to your user account, but still want to submit with full anonymity, we acknowledge that our system process has been built in a way that even our system won't know who you are if you select to be fully anonymous.
  • If you choose to reveal your identity, we will store your personal information requested, and you will be given the option to choose whether that information is to be kept confidential or not. If you choose to keep your information confidential, it will not be exposed to, or known by, anyone but us.

Legal Counsel:

Legal advice will not be given at this time. Once you submit a report, we will then evaluate and determine whether any legal advice will be given.


Accepted Documentation:

Documentary evidence will not be accepted at this time. Once you submit a report, and once we've evaluated your report, we will then request documentary evidence if we choose to move forward with an investigation. Any documentary evidence that is submitted at this time will be deemed as invalid.


To proceed, you must agree to the following:

fields.name: UserAcknowledgesTerms
fields.fieldText: I understand that, by checking this box, I'm acknowledging that I agree to all terms and conditions

validationRule.errorMessage: You must agree to the terms to proceed.

textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
NEXT STEPS


To view updates on your report use the "View Submission & Results" tab in the navigation menu as seen below:


To view updates on your report use the "View Submission & Results" tab in the navigation menu. This will open a dropdown that gives you four options:

  • Whistleblower Reports (your submissions)
  • Related Investigations (investigations related to your submissions)
  • Related Actions Taken (actions taken related to your submissions and investigations)
  • Support Cases (support cases related to your submissions)

Helpful Links To View Updates & Results:

Whistleblower Report: https://nuvitekllc--benhuttdev.sandbox.my.site.com/wbr/s/detail/{!Record_WhistleblowerReport_Main.Id}

Related Investigations: https://nuvitekllc--benhuttdev.sandbox.my.site.com/wbr/s/relatedlist/{!Record_WhistleblowerReport_Main.Id}/Investigations__r

Related Actions Taken: https://nuvitekllc-benhuttdev.sandbox.my.site.com/wbr/s/relatedlist/{!Record_WhistleblowerReport_Main.Id}/Actions_Taken__r


DISCLAIMERS

• Right to communicate with Congress

• Risk of retaliation, consult experienced counsel

• Blow the whistle on own time with own resources

• Your office’s jurisdiction

• No classified information over unsecured channels

• Office confidentiality practices, and right to confidentiality
